title: The General

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, choose a player to Drink with. They have basic defense tonight.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - If the player you Drink with is attacked, you rampage at their house in a drunken fury.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Rid your county of rapscallions and varmint.

desc:
Post 5347
*He lingers half-awake in his rocking chair fiddling with bronzing war medals. Whatever ghosts haunt him are drowned out by a torrent of whiskey.*
